page.title: 17LOCAL RADIO AND NEWSPAPER
page.content: There are 5 Herald Papers including the Farnham Harald over 30,000 copies are printed each week.The paper spans over an area of 250 square miles.They usually rely on the public for most of the stories or they send their report _ers out.On average they print about 50 stories per week.Choosing the most interesting and factual to print.The editor is Robin Radley. The Post Dispatch is a free paper based in Alton.39,000 copies are issued fortnightly.About 30% of readers submit stories, many of which are used.Other free papers do not affect their circulation but they do affect their advertising. Surrey and Hants. is an alternative free paper covering Farnham, Alton, Bordon, Liphook, Haslemere and Hindhead.They use reports and submitted stories.
